name: Ludo Kingdom
description:
Ludo Kingdom is a board game for two to four players, in which the players race their four tokens from start to finish according to dice rolls. Ludo is derived from the Indian game Pachisi, but simpler.

Ludo Kingdom is a cross platform game that you can play Online multiplayer mode and Private Multiplayer Mode.

Ludo Kingdom has both OFFLINE and ONLINE options to PLAY. Hope you enjoy playing it ;)

Features:
* Play with players across the world
* 2 and 4 player Real-Time Ludo
* Create Private Table and invite friends & family
* Chat with players while you play Ludo
* Play OFFLINE also with friends.
* Play against CPU
* Dice with Player Colors
* Magic Wand in Multiplayer Mode: You can roll the dice, input the desired score you want by manually tapping. (Terms & Conditions Apply).

Enjoy classic Ludo board game with friends, family & kids. Recall your childhood..!!
Free to download game that you can play for hours!!

Any suggestions? We always love to hear from you and making this Game better. Email us at info@gamewithpals.com
Thank you.
